events.message: The customer reported a car collision that occurred at an intersection, filing the initial claim for damages to their vehicle.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the details provided about the vehicle collision incident.
An agent specializing in auto claims was assigned to handle the customer's case, ensuring expert assistance moving forward.
The customer received confirmation that their claim has been acknowledged and is currently under review.
Additional documents such as the police report and photos of the vehicle damage were requested to proceed with the investigation.
The customer submitted the requested police report and multiple images showing the extent of the damage to the vehicle.
The investigation into the auto accident claim was initiated to verify circumstances and extent of damages claimed.
The investigation concluded with confirmation of the collision details and assessment of the vehicle repair costs.
A settlement amount was proposed to cover the repair expenses based on the investigation findings and damage assessment.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the clear communication throughout the process.
The claim was officially approved following the customer's acceptance of the proposed settlement offer.
The payment for the approved settlement amount was processed and issued to the customer's designated account.
The claim was successfully closed after all procedures were completed and payment was delivered to the customer.
All claim documents and correspondence were archived securely for future reference and compliance purposes.
